biotools.summary: re-Searcher is a GUI-based bioinformatics tool for simplified genomics data mining of VCF files. re-Searcher is a tool aimed to simplify the task for genomics data mining from VCF files. Now there's no need to perform difficult script manipulations in IDE with Python or R.

bioschemas.name: re-Searcher
bioschemas.summary: re-Searcher is a GUI-based bioinformatics tool for simplified genomics data mining of VCF files. re-Searcher is a tool aimed to simplify the task for genomics data mining from VCF files. Now there's no need to perform difficult script manipulations in IDE with Python or R.
